title: Fix bin/solr help and ref guide text to describe ZK_HOST in solr.in.sh/solr.in.cmd as an alternative to -z cmdline param
description:
E.g. bin/solr start's help text says about the -z param:

To launch an embedded Zookeeper instance, don't pass this parameter.

which is wrong if ZK_HOST is specified in solr.in.sh/solr.in.cmd.
